website_summaries.verdict: A highly adaptable extra-long selfie stick that doubles as a tripod.
pros: Long handle allows for wider shots
Adjustable holder compatible with most phones
Unfolding legs for quick and easy tripod setup with decent stability
cons: Although convenient for seamless tripod operation, the folding legs can feel bulky as a selfie stick handle

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is much more than I expected!!! I purchased this item to only be used with my iPhone 7 Plus. I was very surprised to see that with an otter box case on my phone it fit the provided holder. I have always had a hard time finding something that would hold my phone while in its case. This also fits my canon 80d, and did not tip over. I am unsure if I’ll continue to use my camera on this tripod though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s needed for.
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet. Wish it had a more specific manual/guide. Overall it does what I need it do & is very lonnggg. The pic does not reflect its full length. No complaints. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Candyy1804

customer_reviews.title: Not really a selfie-stick...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a highly adjustable stand for my GoPro. This product is very sturdy even at full extension. My only complaint is that it isn't practical as a selfie-stick because of the girth of the base when the legs are folded in. I would expect the tripod portion to be removable in order to even qualify as a selfie-stick. I didnt buy it for that purpose but if I did, I would be very disappointed. I will give 5 stars but wanted to warn others.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S

customer_reviews.title: Can't get top piece onto tripod legs
customer_reviews.text: First time i went to use this last night I tried for an hour to snap the very most top part to the legs so that I could then attach the phone holder. It will not snap in place and I'm afraid it will break if I tried pushing any harder. Useless as it is unless there is a trick I don't know but it all seemed to be pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your phone won't get hurt
customer_reviews.text: I heard lots of selfie sticks easily fall down which hurts the phones or cameras a lot, so I did a lot of research before I bought this selfie stick. I am glad I made the right decision. This selfie stick is sturdy, even with the tripod extended to the longest length. The bluetooth remote is easy to connect, makes taking family pictures very convenient--- I don't have to RUN back and forth in order to press a button. It also comes with a travel bag which makes travel with the stick more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's 54 inches if you are able to adjust it. I could not. Instructions are not clear and the pictures are very small. For example, I did not find any difference in the pictures between the Locked and Unlocked states. All the tripod feels very weak in hands and not stable. Cheap quality. I am not going to contact customer service. It's just wasting of time. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: GEV

customer_reviews.title: Product is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: it started off well enough upon my acquisition of the tripod. The first thing to go was the ability to comfortably lock in place. It takes actually force to muster it into place especially the taller you want it to go. Next, the bottom leg cover on the stand is off which gives it a lean, and nothing ever shoots evenly. And yesterday the remote totally died. not for lack of charge it just doesn't do that blink of blue even after a full few hours of charging. Cant return it sooo yeah just don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had another one of those bendy iPhone tripod that my dog tore up and this is definitely an upgrade for $5 more bucks. I record myself making music, doing random stuff, and also love using this tripod for pictures. My favorite feature is the fact that you can control the height. It makes it perfect for full body pics and just regular videos from my desk at a shorter setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Youtube Videoes
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tripod for my YouTube Vids to hold my Iphone and this is great! It goes a really tall length so I can even shoot standing up. Ive taken it outside and all around my house and it is pretty steady on all forms of surface. I would caution to be careful with windy places because the higher you go on adjusting length the more "flimsy" it can get because its so much weigh(the phone) on the stick. I normally put something soft down when shooting in windy places to catch my phone just in case. I love the remote very great for selfies. All and all Im pretty impressed
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle williams

customer_reviews.title: A must have when travelling
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is a must have if you like taking pictures, to include your self. Battery on remote last long which is very good. The gadget itself is pretty light but it is a little flimsy. Locking mechanism may not last long depends on how much it will be used. When using by itself like a tripod, the base seems to be not wide enough which can be easily knockout by strong winds. The base should be a little wider. There should be a better way to lock the angle of the direction when you are trying to take a picture. Currently, there's certain angles that the head locks into.
customer_reviews.author: Dad who likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great! So worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Cheap and easy to use and easy to fold up and throw in a backpack on trips! We took it to Greece and Italy with us so we could take photos without needing other people to shoot for us. It worked so well when we wanted pictures at our private Airbnb beach! We will be using it for group photos too - Great to be able to include everyone in the photo with this. Just remember to turn off the remote. We carried a charging bank with us on our trip and charged this when we forgot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bjerke

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product! It functions as a selfie stick and can be extended to 54 inches to be used a tripod for video recording. This product has great grip as it holds my iphone very well without it moving around. The aluminum design of this also makes it extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Stand
customer_reviews.text: Cons: With use, you can tell the twist lock function of the stand will wear out quickly. Sometimes it collapses on its own if you haven't twisted it far enough. Pros: Angle tilt is fully adjustable and I haven't had my phone pop out of the vice grip. Reason for Purchase: We purchased this for the price--yes, it's cheap. It will last for our temporary online piano lessons.
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: cool stick
customer_reviews.text: Multi-use purpose selfie stick, works with my LG V30 phone as well with my Canon DSRL. The stick is pretty long thus it give me a really good angle when using with my phone. It's also sturdy enough to hold up a Canon DSRL camera when using it as a tripod, but i wouldn't recommend putting the tripod on un-even ground, it might tilt because it's not heavy enough, flat ground is fine.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this tripod
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of not being able to take family photos with the whole family together with my phone. This has definitely solved my problem. This tripod has also come in handy for hands-free video chatting. And I love that it has a place to hold the remote, so you don't lose it. The telescoping works great and the whole unit fits well in the bag it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the tripod that I had before broke and I needed to get a lightweight one for replacement. It's cool that this works as both a selfie stick and a tripod. It's pretty sturdy too but I don't think it'll hold a heavy dslr though since it's not really made for that. Other than that, it's a good travel tripod and great for your phone. Very lightweight and easy to use. It comes with go pro and cellphone mount.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep sturdy but perfect otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing a lot. The remote control is the best part. However, it is not very sturdy. The pieces keeo sliding down into each other and its hars to keep it sturdy enough to stay all the way stretched out for full body pics. If that was fixed then this product would be a full 5 stars. The top holds my phone great and can be bent at all angles for all types of pictures
customer_reviews.author: AliceS

customer_reviews.title: It's about what you expect for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I think if you plan to use the tripod frequently you will want one that is a bit easier to use and sturdier. I have had a heck of a time getting the phone positioned the way I want in terms of angle, height and tilt. As soon as I am getting in position one of the poles slips down even though I put it in lock position and a myriad of other small aggravations. I plan to get a higher quality one, because this one is just too much of a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod
customer_reviews.text: Once you go pistol grip you can never go back. It feels so good to use! The rest of the stand is also excellent; I love the variety of angles I can position the legs at, its heft, and the fact that I can adjust most every screw to get the perfect amount of resistance. I'm docking a star from its "light weight" rating because while it is a reasonable weight I would not call it light. The included carrying case is nice as well. I'm to the point where I want to buy this for the photographers in my family!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Decent tripod
customer_reviews.text: Great tripod. The only complaint I have is that there’s no lock system to keep it from collapsing after you’ve expanded it. If you’re taking a selfie and you turn it the stick at an angle it collapses. Love the remote.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but damaged during shipment.
customer_reviews.text: I do love it. It would have been everything I could ever asked for if it didn’t arrive this way. I had bought this used, and I was told that the product condition was overall good; but I do understand this might have happened during transportation. I put my phone in it anyway, obviously. Fit my iPhone 11 Pro Max WITH an Otterbox Defender, and had much more room to spare! Size was my ultimate concern. General functionality seems robust! I can just glue the leg back together, but that will mean this thing will be standing forever—I don’t mind, but I bought this for conveniency, also. Not a huge deal, tbh. But I’d definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chungus

customer_reviews.title: This selfie stick is more than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first selfie stick tripod, I purchased it to be used with my iPhone X Plus. I am a beginner, so it is just fit my needs. I use this tripod to take myself videos, and take photos with my family. Also it comes with a remote although it connection is not very fast. I really like it. It’s also flexible to turn in any direction I want your phone to be in and it was very easy to put together too. I’ll recommend this it to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: cindy wang

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really good tripod for the price! I've never had an issue with the remote and it's super convenient to just click a self portrait or a family shot from in front of the lense! Also helpful for night photos and long exposure pictures of the stars. These pictures require stability and this tripod provides that!
customer_reviews.author: Mattlyn Droll

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a sturdy, transportable tripod stand that will solve all my needs. This is so easy to use and set. In addition, even with the phone case, it can hold my phone, which is another great feature for me. I can't wait to take us to travel. This selfie stick is perfect for adding some depth to your photos. It is very sturdy and stands upright on its three legs, stabilizing your equipment to any height within the telescopic range. The included remote control allows the tripod to be kept farther while still taking pictures and is very easy to pair with my device. Can make a wider range of selfies.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Holds my iPhone XS well, not too flimsy for indoor photos/videos
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent tripod for the price. I do my videos sitting down and it does allow for a good angle, I no longer have to pile up books on top of a dresser. It appears a little flimsy, BUT I use my phone to record and it seems to hold it just fine. I would say if you’re concerned for it to get knocked over, just duct tape it to the floor. The remote works well. Overall, not bad for using with the phone. Definitely will not hold a camera. But it’s decent for it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth tripod!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tripod! I’ve had it for 2 years now. I use it all of the time to record horseback riding videos and for taking pictures and videos on trail rides, vacations, etc. the remote works great! I actually need to buy another one because I lost my remote on the trails today. I haul the tripod around in my saddle bag and it has never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very weak and not dependable, remote doesn’t work with Facebook live
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and weak. The connection points are twist and friction which makes them very easy to loosen up and slip during use. I also purchased a smartree which has levers to lock it and the unit is far stronger and heavy duty, did I mention cheaper? Remote couldn’t be much lower quality. Not worth the $25
customer_reviews.author: Dean Van Damme

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old took it out to explore before me. He was able to twist and untwisted it as if he knew what to do. He said it is cool but not cool because it is taller than him at the end. This can definitely help take selfies from a long distance with the remote. It did not come with instructions, so I had to figure out how the rotation works (first time using a selfie stick). I had to mix and match, and explore with the screws a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Breakitdown

customer_reviews.title: Never Had a Selfie Stick before
customer_reviews.text: I liked the remote and it connected up to my phone no problem but can't get it to function to take pictures or record. The instructions have been written on what equates to a match pack cover and are tiny and extremely vague. I bet the Chinese version is longer. Still I didn't get it for the remote so I am keeping the selfie stick because it is adjustable and will fit a variety of devices.
customer_reviews.author: RWSR

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: this try pod selfie stick ... I love it!!! It's a little awkward and a little cumbersome to be a selfie stick, but light enough to use as a selfie. I've find out using it for tri-pod more , I've also like the fact that it's adjustable height where I can use it on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: TW270

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Shaft won't stay up even though there's no phone on the top holder. Stretch the shaft to the max and down it goes once you release it. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Zero

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I needed! I'll be shooting video from my phone a lot more and it fits perfectly on top of my desk. Also, I have an iPhone XS max and my phone fits snugly into the holder. It is lightweight, easy to set up, and comes with a carrying case so it's super portable. It also comes with a remote which is awesome because I'll need it for my trips this summer. My selfies will be lit!
customer_reviews.author: Zsa Zsa Whyce

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: WORTH the price if you are looking to take your own family photo and NOT spend money a photographer! The only draw back is if you are doing outdoor use, be cautious of winds. The tripod is fine but a small gust will blow it over, you will need something to anchor it down - especially if you are going to be using expensive equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and carry.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! At first I thought the pot is too short and barley stand. But it turns out that it was just folded up. The Bluetooth clicker is attached to the base with special mount which is very nice way to store. It’s great tool traveling and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: JandR

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEEEE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new tripod/selfie stick! I love how it’s a combo instead of having to carry 2 separate things! It came in a cute carrying bag and I like how it has an actual remote holder on it rather it being separately because I tend to misplace things easily! Totally awesome how it can extend from being a selfie stick to 54 inches in height!!! I can’t wait for it to start getting warmer so I can use it outside to take pics!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve added a photo of us in Switzerland, where you can kinda see the stick being used.We love it!The shutter control is a removable Bluetooth remote- pretty slick! It will accommodate a larger iPhone or Android with a protective case.Bluetooth linkup seem to be quick and seamless once you pair it with your phone or camera.
customer_reviews.author: marian awuah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!It is very convenient to carry when you travel. The stable tripod helps the camera to fix the Angle and adjust the length of the stick, so that the picture can be taken in a comprehensive way. I like this product very much. I have traveled twice and put it in my suitcase for the first time every time. Great! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Remote control for phone camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a tripod for a long time but worry too much weight for travel. This one is pretty light yet still very stable. Extra bonus is that I can use it as selfie stick since they provided a Bluetooth remote. I figured out I could actually take it off from the tripod and use it independently!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Song

customer_reviews.title: Not stable.
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult leaving it in one size without it collapsing. Really shakey
customer_reviews.author: Farzad Youshei

customer_reviews.title: Works ok and useful when you need it
customer_reviews.text: The tripod feature works better than the selfie stick. There’s some difficulty locking and keeping the pole sections steady. Used it to take group photo and placed it on a dining table. I recommend, works ok, don’t expect perfection.
customer_reviews.author: dice6

customer_reviews.title: Very smart design
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different types of tripod, but this one just have the best design on stretching the main sticks. It is very convenient and fast to use. I mainly use for my phone but sometimes I would use on my camera as well, it is hard to find tripod has this adaptability. it comes with a remote but it doesn't work with camera so I barely use it. overall, very good product. For camera user, this tripod only works on flat surface cause it's legs couldn't be adjust.
customer_reviews.author: XiaoLing Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Works Very good with Android
customer_reviews.text: Very good tripod Sturdy Sturdy Sturdy Tall tripod makes taking pictures very easy without help. Remote sync fast and had no issues. Tripod has 3 levels with 3 separate locks to make sure it stands tall without falling.
customer_reviews.author: Glass House

customer_reviews.title: No integrity
customer_reviews.text: I had one before and I left it at an Airbnb so I bought another. This one must be faulty in that it wiggles around and hardly can stand up straight when fully extended. Life happened and I didn’t have a chance by return it before that option expired. So it’s good, but too delicate for me.
customer_reviews.author: thecloudykiwi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's made well for the price and there's a small screw for tightening the phone chamber that sets this apart from others where the screw easily gets warped then it doesn't hold. That's a detail that surprised me.I got this to help with my online teaching, but it is so much more useful than that.I've used it several times and have been happy with each use.
customer_reviews.author: Latrese  Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble after a couple of tries, easy to use with remote control. however, I am still having issues when I decide to put it back into the carrying bag. does not fit completely. besides that, I am super happy with the product since it was a cheap option with fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick tripod is AMAZING! I am amazed with everything this stick does! You just blue tooth your phone to it and you can take photos and videos remotely! And it’s so easy to use! Also the tripod stick even has a place that stores the remote! And you can also charge the remote! I would absolutely recommend this to EVERYONE! Use it at home or on the go! Would be great for Vacations too!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This tripod was such an affordable option and it worked perfectly for what I needed. It was left outside for a few weeks, in the elements, to record day-long footage and it was great. Sturdy, easy to use, and well worth what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Foley

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Room saver. Easy twist to expand and set up. Love that the adjustable phone holder doesn't put pressure on my phone and it holds well. Can also take pic on a down angle. The legs holds and minimizes the wobbliness. Although, it can get annoying sometimes when the legs keep sliding an inch or so out. It takes a while to get used to taking a selfie. IMO, the legs make it easier to get a grip therefore taking straighter photos. Love this selfie tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is so easy to use that I didn't even have to read the instructions on how to put it together, or how to use it.The bluetooth remote is easy to connect and use; however make sure your iPhone does not have the orientation lock on as somehow this will cause the remote to not communicate properly with the phone camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs this selfie stick, it's a little bigger than the ordinary selfie stick, but this is totally feasible, it is stable and the construction is very strong, you can fold and expand very easily. You can use your mobile phone, vertical or horizontal, tilt up or down, adjust the height as you like. The wireless remote is the best part. I took it on vacation for a week and had so many beautiful photoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: NICE TO HAVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is just amazing. Not only affordable but also fully functional. Whether using a mobile phone or a camera, it's easy to use. It is small and very portable, so remember to take it with you when traveling with family and friends. Finally, its Bluetooth remote control can be placed directly on the selfie stick itself, never forget to take out the door, and the remote control can also control zoom in and zoom out, which is wonderful. I would like to recommend it to anyone who is considering buying a selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: BTH

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and it’s really light
customer_reviews.text: I got this tripod couple days ago and it’s exactly what I want. First, it is really easy to set up. Just twist it and get the height that you want and twist it again, it will stay there solid. Second, as this long tripod, you will not believe how light it is! Really easy to carry and it come with a carry bag. Definitely will be first choice for your travel. Last but not least, the controller is easy to use and you don’t have to download any app. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Boxiao Li

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we asked for
customer_reviews.text: We had looked at a lot of different tripods but were concerned with the durability relative to the price point. We needed something that was taller, but didn't want to spend a lot of money since we wouldn't use it all that much. It's definitely not designed to be a high end tripod. But we set it up on an uneven dirt trail and it worked just fine. I could see it blowing over in windy situations, but for what we paid for and for our needs, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I put the web camera on the selfie stick. Because I need wide angle for the live streaming. It’s easy to install. It’s higher than my table. I can adjust more higher too. Easy to use. I think maybe it can handle 5 pounds dsrl too.
customer_reviews.author: Qing H. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Camera artifact, I really like it
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tripod is very good, which is in line with my Apple mobile phone. I can take my whole family to travel and take pictures. It is a very good product and it is easy to set up Bluetooth. A satisfactory shopping
customer_reviews.author: Vishan Sheth

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I am a photographer, traveler, so i like taking ALOT of pictures (selfies or not) and record videos. I originally purchased a cellphone tripod mini from another brand which helped me to the job in the gym but was limited on height which affected videos. Therefore I decided to try this selfie stick tripod am I glad I did. EOCEAN’s Selfie stick tripod is just what I needed. I will definitely be buying a second one and keeping one in my gym bag and one my purse. Debating about a third for my photography bag. This item is a definite must have. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Never R

customer_reviews.title: Not compact
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Well made. My only issue, is that it is much less compact than I was hoping. Bulky, and assembly involved. Definitely cannot fit in my purse, for quick and easy use, which was what I was hoping to be able to do. But otherwise, a nice selfie stick, with a tripod base.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Remote defective
customer_reviews.text: Pretty upset that the remote doesn't work. Plugged it in to charge and it works but when I unplug it stops working. The whole reason I purchased was because it has a Bluetooth remote...but it doesn't work unless its plugged into the wall. So pointless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got stuck in second use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it twice but on the second use it got stuck and I’m not able to collapse it all the way down. Sad part is the return period ended so I can’t even exchange it. Annoyed and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not well made flemsisy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this at all it’s flimsy and if you want to have the phone up right you have to do it differently. And the biggest problem I find is that the tripod itself is extended out sometimes you try to move it just a little bit and then the thing collapses. And it’s because of the way that each individual section you just turn it to unlock it and extend it out well even if you turn it back to supposedly lock Doesn’t really lock in the place. I had two of these now because I thought maybe the first one was defective but no this one does the same. Definitely crap
customer_reviews.author: Ilovemymac

customer_reviews.title: It does the job :)
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, but it works. I bought this to take photos with (duh). It works and does the job. It is frail though and flimsy, so you have to be careful. Other than that though, it works and I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Collapses too easily
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but poorly executed. I felt like I was wrestling it to stay in place and not collapse. Thankful to be able to return it. I bought the version that the rod segments lock and I’m much happier with it. Really can’t afford to drop my new iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetwater Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I want to say is that I was very impressed with the quality of this product, that time my nephew came to my house to use it as a stick. It only made one or two marks after falling and smashing. I feel comfortable using this product. It can be used in any application and has a wide range of uses. It makes my iPhone X no problem. I put a full-size camera (as a tripod/monopod) on it and it can hold it well. It's also great to use!
customer_reviews.author: Snorkadoodlers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!w3
customer_reviews.text: This came in very good time, the day before stated and well packed. Upon opening, I connected via bluetooth to my Huawei P20 , no problem then charged it up. I put this stick to use the next day. The handle itself is good, the stick doesn't slip out of your hand and theirs also a wrist strap just in case. The length of the telescope is brilliant, the pictures I took were also brilliant. This is probably one of the best Selfie sticks I've ever bought, the quality of it is very very good. I was happily impressed with this - Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This self timer tripod is great.
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is fixed on the ground, which is very stable. It's really very convenient for people who love to take pictures. The photos are very beautiful and clear. I can't put it down. I have to trouble others to take pictures for me any more. The key is that the design is very good, it's easy to carry, it's more convenient to go out, and the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: prestynn

customer_reviews.title: I think I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is much more than I expected!!! I purchased this item to only be used with my iPhone . I was very surprised to see that with an otter box case on my phone it fit the provided holder. I have always had a hard time finding something that would hold my phone while in its case. This also fits my canon 80d, and did not tip over. I am unsure if I’ll continue to use my camera on this tripod though.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Harrod

customer_reviews.title: Great for live streaming
customer_reviews.text: We have gatherings in these gatherings sometimes have what is called a witness talk. I used the tripod with my phone to live stream to talk to other members of our community. The tripod was dirty... Just the right height... Easy to use... Easy to store... It was exactly what we needed. Because we used the video on this particular instance, I was not able to use the remote, but in getting acquainted it worked just fine with my phone. Very handy gadget for those of you who like to take selfie’s.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Pandolfi.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, simple but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of this tripod! The instructions were pretty basic. You can tell it was cheaply made but we just wanted something for our family to take pictures with all of us in the picture. Not bad, but I can see this eventually breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa B Kovach

customer_reviews.title: wow!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Great price for how great of a product this is. :) I have bought tripods in the past and never had one as sturdy as this one!
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Is too flimsy, the iPhone is not secure on it. You have to hold the stand with some weight otherwise it falls down
customer_reviews.author: mmcc

customer_reviews.title: Not good as a selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I like the length of this stick but it is flimsy and woobly. Used as a selfie stick it is uncomfortable to hold because of the tripod legs that you have to wrap your hands around. As a tripod it is very shaky because of its length and rather loose joints .
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: love this new tripod!
customer_reviews.text: So this tripod can function as a selfie stick as well since it isnt so bulky. i love the fact that it has a bluetooth remote so you can take pictures from afar! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Omazing Kudos

customer_reviews.title: , The bracket quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I use it to record my life. The quality of the bracket is very good, and the height is absolutely satisfactory. It is not difficult to install. My wife likes it very much. It is a good product. By the way, if you like traveling, this product will be very convenient to record life with your family. , You don’t have to keep raising your hands anymore, keep one movement all the time, it’s easy
customer_reviews.author: chen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Took to Hawaii. Never had a problem connecting to phone. This is a very durable product. I have gone through 2 other selfie sticks and they broke quite easily. This seems more substantial and easy to connect and use. Never had to charge during our week visit there.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fiszer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Tripod it's great for the content I create. It's very customizable in terms of adjusting the length and shot frame. Would definitely recommend it. I haven't tried out the remote control and I'm not quite sure how it works yet so once I try it I will update my review. But in terms of the tripod I really like it. I also love the portable bag it comes in!!
customer_reviews.author: Getaneh Workie

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: To start off, I bought this for the tripod purpose! Tripod is easy to use & to extend for hight. To lock each section in just twist & it'll be locked into place. One thing I dislike is how flimsy it is but overall makes a great tripod for the price! Definitely money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately remote does not pair up with my iPhone 11 Pro nor wife’s iPhone XS nor iPad. Selfie stick itself is good but without a remote does not do pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Cem Ersahin

customer_reviews.title: Good! Until... But then...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for filming videos on my phone and it worked great! I had no problems with it, until it broke. The bottom part, which looks like a bottle cap, just randomly fell off. I was just trying to collapse it, but it broke on me. I enjoyed using it while it lasted. UPDATE: I contacted the company, and they agreed on sending me a replacement free of charge! Great customer service, and it's much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Michelberg

customer_reviews.title: Good for taking your own pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and use it to take my social media pictures! The only thing I have trouble with is locking it in place on the level I want. It takes me awhile to finally get it to stay at the right level.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good basic phone tripod
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase!It is very sturdy, and the quality of the parts it's great. Nice metal construction, super easy to adjust, and very flexible in terms of positioning a phone or camera.This tripod is perfect.Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: christian perez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail about an hour ago and have been messing around with it taking pics, facetime, video, and I'm really impressed with this device. It's well made and sturdy, doesn't feel cheap and good size. Lets see how long it lasts, I'll update if I have any issues. So far though, this tbing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Burge

customer_reviews.title: hands-free and it feels so good!
customer_reviews.text: I used this often during this pandemic to hold my phone while video chatting with my friends while playing games. I really love this thing.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone tripod the remote is a huge bonus
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, works perfect and closes up super small for storage, I used the tripod to take pictures of my daughter and me for our Christmas card having the remote is perfect so we didn’t have to rush and pose using the timer (5 year olds can sometimes take longer) taking multiple shots is nice. Pictures turned out great I would definitely recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!

Very satisfied, height can adjust, installation method is very simple, the stability of the tripod is very good, shaft firmly, the lens will not sway, out for indoor use is very convenient to use and receive package also convenient and ease of installation: good installation overall evaluation: useful, cost-effective material work: quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Reid grayling rehbein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my selfie. I am using my phone to record my daily life, but i need something to stabilize my smart phone. I searched this and bought it. It’s very easy to use, and it can change the height and also the angle of your phone. If you are a person liked me, buy it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old son love this tripod
customer_reviews.text: My sons buddy got one for his birthday and my son tried it out, he saved his money up and purchased one, he uses it every day, the remote is blue tooth and work great with his iPhone, he lost his remote and was sick over it, he contacted Eocean and with no hesitation they promised to send him a new one free of charge, very nice company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Outperforms relative to weight and size; great for ultralight hiking
customer_reviews.text: Construction was just a tad on the flimsy side, and wish I could have extended out the tripod legs for less-than-even/flat conditions. But overall, was happy with the product - lightweight, super convenient/folds down into tiny frame, easy Bluetooth pairing with my iPhone 11 Pro. Got lots of people on the trail asking about it, as their tripods were either true mini-tripods (didn’t extend up more than 12”) or were much bulkier and heavier than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Wiggly
customer_reviews.text: Not too goof the clap in which holds the phone is so weak I want my money back asap and I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Margot Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Cool Selfie Stick Tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool selfie stick tripod that's light but nicely built. The camera mount slider can be adjusted with a screw on the top. The tripod can can stand up to 54 inches which is pretty convenient for selfies or time lapses. It also comes with a Bluetooth wireless remote and a carrying bag. Cool.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very helpful camera accessory. It seems well built and very useful. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good live streaming artifact, also very suitable for selfies, the effect is very satisfactory.

customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I can take pictures of my self whenever and wherever. And also love the rotation on it because I can capture different angles of myself. Also my friend used it and she loved it.

customer_reviews.title: disassembled and shrunk
customer_reviews.text: Very stable, easy to use, can be disassembled and shrunk, easy to carry, suitable for outdoor shooting and video use, I want to take it out for a try, this is a good tool, the weather is right, go out with family and friends, try it, wait for me The quality, material, stability, and color are all what I like when I come back. The overall is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and clunky, unable to adjust angle.
customer_reviews.text: The very basic function of securing a phone and shooting video/photos was met, but the inability to adjust for angles or levels lead to poor capture. The phone can be strength on or it clicks to preset points and does not hold in needed angle. The lack of leg adjustment means it can't be used on uneven surfaces effectively. Cheaply made materials and it sways if extended more then halfway to full height.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur Tuber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Compatible, Android and Apple can use it. At first, I was worried that my husband's mobile phone would not work, because his machine was quite unpopular, and the selfie stick was more stable than the stainless steel at home. Recommended, especially People with outdoor shots must buy this kind of aluminum alloy to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Qreddy tapia

customer_reviews.title: Good but with issues
customer_reviews.text: I liked it for the fist couple uses but the twist and lock feature stopped working and it keeps dropping everytime I try to use it for tripod or a long selfie. I'd look for one that has the clips verses twist and loc.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great useful item!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for use with my YouTube channel it is great it allows me to have the freedom I need when recording... and it’s great on the go ... The remote works perfect and it com!!!es with a nice carrying bag great item
customer_reviews.author: Don Brier

customer_reviews.title: Great product for selfies, group photos, and landscape photos
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to extend the length and the tripod feature for group photos and selfies too! Extends very easily and tripod is stable. This came in very handy when on a trip alone because I could take pictures of scenic landscapes and include myself in some of them to share with family and friends. I also like the tripod because it holds the phone or camera steady. The only downside to this product is that the remote sticks at times and I have had to push really hard to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: A little too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like it. Used with a GoPro, not a full height, any breeze at all and it wanted to tip over. The locking mechanism for each extension is iffy as well. Going for something stronger instead.
customer_reviews.author: MountainCamping

product_meta.title: Selfie Stick Tripod, Eocean 54'' Extendable Selfie Stick with Phone Tripod Stand & Wireless Remote for iPhone SE 11 Pro Max X 8 7 6 Galaxy Note 9 Android, Perfect for Live Stream/Vlog, Lightweight
feature_bullets: 【Multifunctional Selfie Tripod】3 in 1 - Selfie Stick Tripod, table tripod, Handhold Tripod. The strong aluminum telescopic pole and non-slip foot pad make the tripod more stable to record video and take photos. Universal 1/4" Screw Mount Compatible for most digital cameras, Project, recorders and Telescopes.

【Wireless Rechargeable & Removable Remote】Do not need apps, instantly wireless connection, easy to operate. Free your hand to catch meaningful moment in your life. Pocket size for Android and iOS. The remote can be fully charged in 30 minutes and has a standby time of up to 3 months and it has 50000 hours lifespan and 30 ft remote control distance. Please note the the remote only works for smart phones but not camera!

【Extendable & Foldable & Portable 】Sturdy, but flexible. Only 13.77’’ in folded size and 14.4oz in weight. You can take it anywhere. The small size makes it perfect for travel, sports activities, camping, family gatherings and much more.The selfie stick tripod can be extended between 12.2 - 52.36inches, which allows you to get a wider shooting range. Very suitable for Photograph, Facetime, live stream, vlogger, video recording and more. Please note to lock the stick when extend it.

【Adjustable & Rotatable Phone Holder】A 360° rotation phone holder and a 180° rotation head , makes you easily find the best & beautiful shooting angle. The universal phone holder can be compatible with most of phones, such as iPhone SE 11/11 pro max/Xs/Xr/X/8/8 Plus/7/Samsung Galaxy Note 9/S9/Huawei/Google and so on.
【Great Customer Service】Eocean take pride in top quality products & great customer service. So if you’re not 100% satisfied, don't hesitate to let us know.
